website_summaries.verdict: A great purchase for the price that works well at home or on the road.
pros: Can switch from heating to cooling
Comes in a choice of several colors and patterns
Very quiet, and uses little power
Comes with both AC and 12-Volt adapters
cons: Some buyers report problems with this cooler dying after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe when I received this that when I opened it, I was greeted to one of the most foul orders in existence - fish. I was sent a used cooler. There was water condensation on the bottom, the fridge smelt like old fish, and it was clearly dirty from use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Great portable cooler to have in your Room.
customer_reviews.text: The cooler works but I get standing water and ice on the 4 screws. Waiting for update by customer support. Hope it’s before my return date. Is this normal? Update: Looks like I may have a defective one. Going to return and reorder. It’s a great little cooler but a little annoying I have to wipe up a pool of water. It does keep a six pack nice and cold. Let it sit in there for 24hrs and you are set. Can’t wait to order a replacement. **Update** Replacement arrived and Customer Service was Great. Kept in contact from start to finish to make sure the packaged arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute lil cooler/warmer. Perfect size for my night stand. I use it to store my facial serums that need to be kept cold. Read some reviews that said its loud. Its not at all, has a low humming sound. Hardly noticeable. Happy with my purchase, wish I had bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina McCoy

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for my dorm but the only thing I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for my dorm but the only thing I didn't like was that there would be a puddle of water every morning due to condensation.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first 2 and a half months of use, then all the sudden stopped working. Not sure what happened, the fan was still on but nothing would stay cool inside anymore. Unfortunately this happened after the refund period, so I can't even get a refund for my money. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ferri

customer_reviews.title: Nearly caught on fire, melted power switch in first hour.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged the fridge in using the AC wall plug, as one does. After about 1 hour we smelled burning electronics, noticed smoke coming from backside of fridge. I Immediately went to flick the switch to the off position, although it was seized.. melted in place. Luckily amazon immediately provided me with a refund and advised I throw the fridge away. I haven’t purchased a replacement yet due to lack of quality options.
customer_reviews.author: Vince and/or Gina

customer_reviews.title: This is a lifesaver in the nursery
customer_reviews.text: I assume it would cool a six pack with ease. However, in our case, it keeps breastmilk cold in the nursery. With the top rack not installed, you have no issues cooling a 4oz baby bottle with the nipple and cap installed. Saving a trip down the steps to the fridge and bottle warmer has helped us calm down the baby when she is hungry at zero dark thirty.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little cooler
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little cooler, I use it to hold small cartons of milk and other drinks and it keeps them cold and ready to drink. I have it plugged in 24/7 and have had no problem with it. I did have to wiggle the power cord in order to get it fully inserted the first time, but once it was up and on it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Great... while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little fridge right up until it died last night. This mini fridge worked for 5 months before it just up and quit. It made a horrible screeching sound when I opened it to get a bottle out at 3 am to feed my baby. I had to unplug it to make it stop. Tried letting the motor cool off and wiping off the filter on the back and plugged it in again the next day. Same awful noise came out. I expected it to last a year at the minimum. I wish it had. It was very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very cute,works great. It comes with 2 plugs,one for a house outlet and the other for a cigarette lighter plug. I got this for my mom,so she could store her insulin in it, in her room by her bathroom . Instead of walking all the way to the kitchen to get it.
customer_reviews.author: brandyrose

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mini fridge for my son’s bedroom. It worked well for a month and then it just died. It is small, cute and while it worked it did the job of keeping the drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: dwfan

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Cooling Now
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this mini fridge in June, it did an awesome job keeping drinks cold, to the point where condensation would form on the cans when you took them out. But as of Mid-September, it's barely cooling them at all. Not sure if I'd recommend buying one of these....
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little unit, works as pitched
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fridge to have around. We bought it to send with our son on a week-long trip, where he be staying in a dorm with limited space & power. We tested it before sending him off with it. We found it took about a day to chill canned or plastic bottles to a nice temperature. This is not a refrigerator in the traditional sense - no compressor, which you have to keep in mind when setting your cooling expectations. It doesn't chill as fast, but it's technical makeup is not the same as an actual refrigerator. Power draw was minimal and make no noticeable noise while plugged-in. Make sure the rear fan has clear airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Man

customer_reviews.title: Chill Without Ice
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good--a great product that works well (keeping warm food/drink warm or cold, cold) while taking up less room than most 6-can coolers. This cooler has room for 6-12 once beverage cans and can be plugged into an electrical socket or used via a cigarette lighter in your vehicle. No more ice or "cold packs" required to keep those drinks chilled. This is especially nice when you are returning home from a visit and forget to load that cooler. I found that a 12 once can of pop can be chilled from room temperature in about 2 - 2.5 hours...just about the right time to switch from hot to cold caffeine on that trip.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Effective and silent
customer_reviews.text: In constant use for several weeks now, with zero problems. I use it at my office for keeping drinks and/or my lunch cold. Runs silently and keeps everything VERY cold. Does not get below freezing, and it takes a while to cool an item from room temperature. Loading it with already chilled items is the best way to use it (a room temp soda took about 1.5 hours to chill completely). Pros: pretty much silent, quick setup, no hassles, comes with a car adapter and USB adapter (can only run in energy saver mode on USB), magnetic door closure is nice and tight Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Used
customer_reviews.text: First, I do not know if this product actually works. I never plugged it in. Product arrived by promised delivery date. Arrived in appliance box - no outer box - just as if you picked it up off retail shelf except it wasn’t sealed in any way. Opened box and bright little cooler is inside. Immediately noticed smudges on top of cooler. Looked over outside and found fingerprints. Looked inside cooler to locate electric cords and operating papers. Noticed dried water spots on interior refrigerator walls. Packed it up and sending back. Thought I was purchasing brand new, never-been-used appliance. Guess not.
customer_reviews.author: CDGIAM

customer_reviews.title: Good size but DO NOT BUY. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This small refrigerator LEAKS, and the small square in the back ices over. I read a review similar to this but bought the item anyway to keep my $400 NOVA TEARS for my DRY EYS COLD and upstairs close to my bedroom. I only open the small refrigerator, 4 times a day, 7am, noon, 6pm, and 9pm to get a small 1" vial of specially made NOVA TEARS out to use them. The vial is the ONLY ITEM in the small refrigerator. It is elevated, and away from the wall, with plenty of ventilation. A word to the wise, I wasted my money, and is too late to return the item. :( It
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cooler
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’m loving this little cooler. I bought it to keep a dermatological prescription in my bathroom since I was constantly forgetting to use it when it was in my main fridge. It’s small enough to fit in the corner of my bathroom, makes very little noise (no louder than a small humidifier or diffuser,) and cools down fast. I plugged it in and walked away, but used my fish tank thermometer to determine it was down to 38 degrees (F) a few hours later. Probably a bit warmer than a normal fridge, but not by much. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie E.

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first. Stopped working within two weeks, I contacted seller which then wanted me to perform a series of troubleshooting. After I tried one this fridge totally went out, leaking water and getting in some of my products. Initially asked for a replacement and I would send this apparently defected one back, but no. So I am returning. Will purchase from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: which are useless once oxidized
customer_reviews.text: I bought this (in pink) to store my expensive/fragile skin care in my bathroom to increase the shelf life of the products. Especially for products containing vitamin c, which are useless once oxidized. It's not exactly a fridge, more of a cooler but it does what I need it to. I can fit quite a few items in it. The overall design is cute but a little bulkier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt leave it on more than 24 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this fridge. I wanted to use it to store my hedgehogs food in my room. However, if i left it on for more than 24 hours it would start to leak water into the fidge. I needed to leave the fridge on pretty much forever. The reason i bought the fridge was because the reviews said people were leaving it on continuously without issues. However, It was warmer in the fridge than it was in my room, which was not what i wanted. And it was set to cold, i made sure. But yeah, i wish it worked for me, unfortunately it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I think I will return it :(
customer_reviews.text: Using this for the first time today at work (to store breast milk). Even with my ice pack in there I’m still almost in the danger zone. I don’t feel comfortable with that. Unfortunately I think I’m going to return it. I really was hoping this would work. If it was just my lunch I wouldn’t mind but for breast milk I want it safe. Gave it two stars because it’s cute and would’ve been perfect if it was cool enough!
customer_reviews.author: Bia

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to store my skincare products.
customer_reviews.text: I really love how cute and portable this is, I bought this to store my skincare products and sheet masks. I don’t have any issues with it leaking or dripping water from the bottom like I’ve read in some of the other reviews. It sits on the counter of my bathroom in a open space and I don’t clutter anything around it that may impede the circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Water Pooling Inside the Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fridge to store high end skincare, to keep it from going bad. It works well enough, but I was frustrated to find little puddles of water inside the unit, which has damaged some of the products that this fridge was supposed to protect. I attempted to contact the Cooluli customer service months ago, and never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps medications, drinks & snacks cool w/o the cold and wet mess of melted ice...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Cooluli Mini Fridge Electric Cooler and Warmer. In the last few months, I've used the Cooluli for a friend's insulin, water and cold coffee beverages during a couple spontaneous summer time road trips. Lightweight, car travel friendly, compact and very quiet. Keeps things chilled, even if I turn off the car engine for a couple hours to sleep. I have not used the warmer function. I'll update this review, if I ever do. BTW, I purchased this via Amazon directly and was not offered any type of enticement for this review. This is just my honest review of a product that has makes my life a little bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: HelB

customer_reviews.title: Not safe for storing breastmilk!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for overnight bottles for two months. In the past few weeks, bottles don't seem to be as cold. I understand the mini fridge is not as powerful as a regular refrigerator, but just we just took the temperature of a bottle...and it's 60 degrees. In a 70 degree room. Nothing like spending nearly $50 and then have to throw out breastmilk!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Carver-Bialer

customer_reviews.title: Already broken!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store expressed breast milk in my office. I used it daily on the cooling function starting in April, then not again until this month. So I’ve used it for a total 2 months, and it died already. I only turned it on from hours of 8am-4pm and off when I left work. How disappointing. I loved it while it worked. I would recommend others try a different brand so you will get a longer life span out of what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Uncovered protruding screw heads on bottom
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit overall works great for keeping a few sodas chilled. Haven't used the heat mode other than to switch it on, and it does get nice and warm. Unfortunately I had this on an end table and it scratched the hell out of it until I realized that the screws in the bottom were sticking out. I've since added some cushioning, but maybe look for one of the similar units but with a proper base.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Norris

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Convenient, COW PRINT!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mini-fridge to store some of my skincare products and it does a great job in doing that! This fridge is great for storing vitamin c suspension, creams, and sprays. I highly recommended if you have facial gua sha tools to store as well as jade/rose quartz rollers (the rose quartz holds the cold better than the jade does). While I am overall very satisfied with the product, there is some condensation water inside the fridge, but it seems to be normal according to other reviews and is not a huge downfall. This is also a cute little decoration in addition to being a minifridge, and the cow print is to die for!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kay

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months...seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Had this running up in our bedroom for baby bottles. It only lasted 4 months. It was good for a while, but now even though the fan is blowing and the light is on, there is almost no coldness whatsoever. What happened???? This really sucks. We don't know what to do, but now we won't be able to have our baby bottles upstairs. Not Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan I.

customer_reviews.title: Beauty Lover Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Im a beauty blogger and so I have loads of skincare items. I absolutely love my mini fridge! Putting on my chilled face masks feel so good when you are out in the heat. I put my teeth whitening gels, face masks, cucumber slices for my eyes and its so awesome. Not to mention extending the shelf life of some of your beauty staples is a huge plus! I highly recommend. Set up was very simple and a must have in any babe cave!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy from Blingtastic_Boutique

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it advertises (cooling review only)
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a long cross-country trip and a few times since to keep beverages cool. It works as advertised, ac plug and cigarette lighter adapter. There's a slight bit of noise when running, so not whisper quiet but for the price and offering the functionality it does, it's hardly a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous#1337

customer_reviews.title: Condensation buildup...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fridge to place on my makeup vanity to keep my skincare products cool. I was thrilled the first couple days after plugging it in. It’s compact, relatively quiet and super portable. The ONLY reason I won’t give this 5 stars is that on day three of having it plugged in I noticed condensation buildup and ice in the back of the unit. If I was storing drinks or food I wouldn’t think anything of it, but since my skincare products call for a cool, dry place I’m not sure if I’ll continue using it. This is in my bedroom in the winter so it’s not like the humidity is high.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn89

customer_reviews.title: No So Cool
customer_reviews.text: Using this mini-fridge is more trouble than it is worth. It takes a long time to cool down, is bulky and might work for a while with cans which are already cold. But, if you plan to put it on the console for handy reach while driving, you're out of luck--it is simply too big and unstable. Ditto for placing ion the rear floor where it will easily topple rolling your Mr. Pibbs under the seats. We think an insulated cooler works better.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my superfood skincare line and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a skincare superfood brand that requires some of their products to be refrigerated, and I didnt want to have to bring my products to and from the kitchen every time I needed to use them, so I bought this little fridge to put in my bathroom on the counter! The fan is a tiny bit "noisy" BUT unless you put it next to your bed you won't hear it unless you're standing right next to the Fridge and paying attention to it. It cooled up super quickly and my skincare products are happy in there! My only caveat is I don't find the thing to look very pretty, but am very happy with it's use thus far!
customer_reviews.author: HOLISTIC HART

customer_reviews.title: Works, but be aware
customer_reviews.text: Not meant for continuous use. Bought all there sizes of the Cooluli (at the time) have all have failed a barely past the mid point of the second year. All 3 of them bad capacitors on the controller/power board. Was able to "fix" the first two by just replacing all the capacitors on the boards, plugged back in and tada, works as usual, this one, the 6 can, died in a puff of smoke. A capacitor popped and caused the on board UF transformer to over heat and leak black goo/tar along the inner casing. Not a pleasant sight after I opened the unit, this one I am just throwing out, looking for a better, not cheaply made, brand.
customer_reviews.author: Costa

customer_reviews.title: I bought the red one!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous. I read tons of reviews for mini fridges and people seemed to love or hate them. Ive had mine a week. I wanted it to keep my cat's insulin in. If I left to go to kitchen he'd follow me then disappear. I keep the fridge in yhe bedroom. So i make up his 2 syringes the night before. Works out great. It keeps stuff cold and it runs quietly. Don't know how long it will last but so far very happy with my purchase! Works out great no injections missed just give cat some treats and get the syringe.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Be Prepared
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cute little frig for keeping insulin safe when camping/long road trip or during a power outage. I tested it and it works great. I am now looking to find some 5" high glass bottles with lids to be able to use the upper rack for insulin and use the bottom half for beverages. I really love it and would recommend it. I also purchased a solar powered/AC/12v power station if the power does go out. Highly recommend takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Product was pre-owned
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes of receiving it, I realized I was sent a used product. The box looked like it had previously been opened. There were multiple nicks and scars on the surface. They tried to make it look as good and shiny as new but I also noticed a few fingerprints in the areas that weren’t thoroughly wiped. Didn’t use it so I don’t know how it works. Realizing that it was used kind of put me off to it. I don’t mind getting a used item, just don’t make me pay full price for it.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper909

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter had to go to camp during the 90/100 degree weather. Did not want to haul a mini fridge, so I ordered this. I was skeptical. She kept 2 bottles of water, and two cans of soda in it. When plugged into a wall outlet, it is darn near as cold as a fridge. During the hot weather, I used it in my car, via USB. It put a chill on the water. You also have to figure that it was working against the heat of a closed car. It was definitely colder than if I would have been left it out. For the portability and the price; it was worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rapidoveride

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for desk
customer_reviews.text: This is cute for my desk and I like that I can take it in the car on road trips. It does say you should start with pre chilled beverages otherwise it takes a few hours to cool. It's basically a plug in lunchbox. The door is hard to open without keeping a hand on the unit itself. Overall, it does feel cool. It's very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Leah K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Super cold super quiet
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is exactly what I wanted! I've had it for over a month and it is whisper quiet. It stays ice cold (literally I've pulled drinks out with a bit of ice on them) and no issues with how it runs. Highly recommend and glad I got it for my desk! Update: 6 months later and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: gingeracha

customer_reviews.title: Love these Coolulis
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the noise in having this in my office, but these are completely silent. I bought one for work, but tried it out first at home and loved it so much I bought another one. I keep one next to my bed and one on one of my desks at work. They are silent and keep things very cold! I've had them for about almost 2 years and am not disappointed. I'm thinking of getting a larger one for the car and also a large one for a boat.
customer_reviews.author: The Chandler

customer_reviews.title: A working, breast feeding mom's friend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store pumped breast milk at work before I go home for the day. I didn't want to put my infant's food in the gross company fridge with everyone else's food. It is quiet and really does chill the milk down quickly. I like that I can USB plug it into my car and run it on my long commute home. The Ameda 4oz. pump bottles fit in it best (mine are from 2012, so I don't know if they've changed the sizing); they can be stacked two bottles high. Medela's are too tall to stack, but if you pump into storage bags that would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money on a "skincare fridge" and buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely fell for the skincare fridge fad but was shocked to see how many overpriced and rebranded mini fridges are out there advertising for cosmetic purposes. This is great for skincare. It's a little bulky but fits well on my nightstand. Keeps everything cool and only occasionally do I have to scrape for frost. It has a heat setting which is very useful to detach any collected ice quickly! Great side door storage as well for smaller items. It is a small fridge but does fit my somewhat extensive collection of creams and serums. It does make noise, just a quiet hum but definitely enough to notice in a quiet bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Renée Martel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little fridge
customer_reviews.text: This petite fridge is a cute addition to my Art Studio! It is really small but I find if I take out the rack I can hold a small bottle of water, yogurt and even a soda and small sub sandwich. To get me through my day! I do notice that after a few days of continuous running it isnt as cold so on occasion I turn it off to give it a rest.the warning function works well but, takes a while (about 30 minutes) to really kick in. Which depending on what your trying keep warm may be a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Lavett B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I researched this fridge with several others, this seemed like the best bang for my money. It proved to be true, after listening to several YOUTUBE videos and also reading several reviews, this one was mentioned as one of the best mini fridges you could buy. I was able to put quite a bit more in the fridge than I thought I would be able to. I am very pleased with my purchase, and it is also very quiet, so quiet I forget it is even there. I needed this because I would forget to use the many face mask that I have acquired. I would never go downstairs to retrieve them, so now I have no excuse.
customer_reviews.author: Gina T. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little refrigerator to go with me on a trip for work. I was going to be staying in a hotel without room refrigerators. This fridge fit nicely into my suitcase and was lightweight. Once there I plugged it in and quickly dropped in temperature. It worked great to keep a few drinks, cheese and yogurt cold during my stay. It was great to come back to my room at night and have a cold drink waiting for me. My kids are looking forward to using it in the car on our next road trip. I also see it being useful when we camp.
customer_reviews.author: F. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold.
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried to use the "warm" setting so I have no idea how functional that feature is, but this tiny fridge keeps things cold very well. Yes from time to time there is some frost in the back and condensation on the bottom but that does not bother me at all. I don't notice any noise at all but I keep it on top of my tool box at work and there's a fair amount of ambient noise here so maybe I just can't hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Rathburn

customer_reviews.title: There's better out there.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this a little over a month, worked great for a bit. But it seems to not keep things as cold and has frosted over twice now. I'm using this for my skincare products and for the temp to drop and go up the way it has is not good for my products. I have to take everything out put it in my fridge defrost this one then let it cool back up and put everything back in. Have done this twice in a month. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little unit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my brother. After seeing it in action we both like it so much that I bought one for myself as well. Its very simple and works very well. The only complaint that I have is that the unit fully loaded is still light enough and the seals are good enough, that I have to use two points of contact to open it. One to hold the unit and the other to open the door. I did turn the heat on long enough just to verify that it works, but we've both used them only as fridges, so the heating part is not really being reviewed here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for skincare products.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to put in my bathroom. I keep a bunch of sheet masks and my vitamin c serum inside of it. I've run it 24/7 for a couple months now and it works like a charm with no issue. The shelf seen in the pictures is removeable. All and all a great purchase for those of us skincare diehards who are extra enough to need this.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Money-Saving Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this little frig. My regular refrigerator is not working well and I am awaiting a part on order. In the meantime, I am able to keep some meat, cheese and sodas cool on these record heat summer days. Otherwise, I would be purchasing my meals daily and this means this purchase has paid for itself. I will probably use it for bottled water in the bedroom once my main frig is repaired.
customer_reviews.author: catmom17

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COOL AT ALL AND ITEM IS NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this product received so many positive reviews. I was very excited to find a solution to keep my insulin cool while I travel. To test it out I left a 12oz soda in the cooler overnight in my air conditioned house. The next morning I was disappointed to find it was the exact temperature as a soda from my pantry. It did not cool AT ALL. The heat feature seemed to work fine. I was thinking maybe I received a defective item and could exchange it, but disappointed to find it was NOT RETURNABLE. Very surprised to have this buying experience on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but 1 year later needs maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I love having this little cooler in my room because I have 3 roommates and we all share a small fridge. Unfortunately over the past 6 months of so it's progressively gotten worse at keeping things cold. I'm not sure if its safe to buy one of those compressed air things because it has chemicals in it, so I just tried blowing the dust out of the fan and wiping with a wet paper towel, but it didn't do too much good. Not sure if I should just scrap it or try the compressed air which is another expense. Argh! Haven't tried the warming feature.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than a year - good when it works
customer_reviews.text: Worked surprisingly well but lasted surprisingly short time. Same problem as others, flashing light and fan wont run. Now its a regular cooler with an ice pack. Cant endorse cost for the life of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Monger

customer_reviews.title: Was ready to love it, but my heart was broken...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, and at first I did. It was cute, light-weight, and it got 6 cans of diet dew cold for me at my desk. Then I came in after a weekend away and I had a warm reception. It stopped working less than a week after I started using. Just stopped. No power light, no cold, nothing. Sad. So, it got two stars for potential, but no stars for execution.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Nice and neat and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for guest bedroom and so inexpensive! Cooled the little water bottles in no time at all. It makes no noise that I can hear. Now you don't have to go downstairs during the night for more water! It's so cute and you don't even notice it in the corner. How cool is that?! Very happy with the purchase. I may get a baby-blue one for the other guest room too.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Bard

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I spend my workday in a car and had to go back to work after having my first child. I bought this so that I could pump at work and keep the milk cold . It worked decently for about the first week and a half and now my AC keeps the inside of the car cooler than this mini fridge can do for my milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mini pink fridge for my daughter who is expecting her first child. She wants to use this to store her breast milk for the baby. She tested it with some drink cans and she said it does get cold but not freezing cold. Hope it works well for her needs. Ill know in a month when I become a grandpa. 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Triple Bogie

customer_reviews.title: OK for lunch, barely
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a desktop fridge for my lunch at work. The communal fridge is just a good way to get ill. This fit the bill, but it is quite small. Really need to go through the ol' Tupperware cupboard to find stuff that fits. Cools things down fast and keeps them cold. I can *just* fit a small salad, can of juice and a sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love it and I'm glad I took the chance of purchasing one
customer_reviews.text: So it's been a week since I received my fridge. So far so good. There isn't any noise, no smell at all, lightweight and so cute on my beauty shelf. My only concern is the fact other reviews said due to condensation the fridge leaked water. I placed a tray underneath just in case. Be sure to give the unit enough space so the heat can circulate. I did notice a few drops of water formed inside the fridge but nothing major. Everything stays nice and cool to cold. I put nearly every serum and cream in there. Great product. YR
customer_reviews.author: Danae Ruiz/Yulonda Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this fridge!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect given a few mixed reviews. I legit couldn’t be more pleased with this fridge. It delivers beyond expectation. 1. Temp - perfectly cold. It’s very cold for such a little u it. Definitely colder than my full size fridge. I’ve had it for 2 weeks running 24/7 and have had no problems with ice. 2. Size - fits 6 cans as promised 3. Sound - not noisy at all. Very little sound off the motor. I don’t even notice it. 4. Quality - well made and light weight if you wanted to travel with it. Light but not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the working mom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store breastmilk in at work and it is perfect! I was a little worried after some of the reviews I read that this would not keep the milk at the reccommend 40 degrees or cooler, but it did great! As soon as I got this I unboxed it and was literally giddy with how cute it was. I plugged it in to my wall outlet and put a glass of room temperature water in. The house thermostat said 73 degrees. After an hour, the water was 49 degrees. After 4 hours it was 33 degrees! I am so excited because this will save me from having to lug a cooler in to work every day!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Defective: Bad chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the mini fridge in January, it made all my food taste like chemicals. I tried turning it off and airing it out, which helped....for a while. If I don’t have my food in glass containers, then everything tastes terrible. Tried contacting the company directly regarding the warranty the same month. No reply or help was given. So now I’m stuck with a $50 fridge that I don’t want to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I chose to buy this product because I had seen other influencers repping this product, and how it will have so many benefits for your skin. In all honesty, I'm not sure if it does that, but it is definitely cooling. It feels like I'm giving myself a spa treatment in my own home and I'd recommend this to anyone who needs a way to relax their muscles through skincare. I haven't tried storing food or drinks in this fridge, but it seems cool enough to be able to do so. It's small enough to fit on a desk and in a car, but big enough to store your favorite products.
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quiet but does need good vent in back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my cosmetics cool in the summer my upstairs bath can get hot I the summer . It is definite not big. I have been putting my lotions and creams and serums in since not wearing makeup during pandemic Addendum 14 October 2020 I have attached photos It does not hold much. But very quiet (44-50dB) and gets too hot to put in open cabinet so I put below my sink with lots of ventilation Also it get ice in back as noted in photo. So once a month I turn off and let defrost and dry out and put stuff back in
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This item is NOT returnable. It's not worth the money either.
customer_reviews.text: This item is NOT returnable. It's not worth the money either.
customer_reviews.author: CooledParrot

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised thats for sure
customer_reviews.text: Whats to like? 2 settings cold or hot...hot works to a lukewarm degree. Cold ummmm I put 4 cans of soda that were temp gun 37 degrees. 4 hours later were 43 degrees. Outdoor temp was 73 degrees...so in 4 hours went up 4 degrees...not bad if it was a Styrofoam cooler for a couple bucks. Standard water bottles will NOT fit...2 bottles leaning... I think this MIGHT work on a desk in a air conditioned office. But as far as milk starage I would be VERY CAREFUL...
customer_reviews.author: ErnieT3

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Its small Its plastic The screws on the bottom and plastic is sharp and will scratch your desk It cools like it should Fan is quiet Shelf and door thingie are removable
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: useful little guy
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the laundry room for cat food cans, and for that its great--small and perfectly sized. I have only had this a short time, my only issue with these mini fridges is that they burn out relatively quickly (last one = 1 year), even though we only run it when there is a can in it. We shall see with this one, But so far its working and relatively good looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: She who knows things

customer_reviews.title: So perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So ive had this a few days and its really amazing for my skincare. Fits everything and then some! Its a little bigger then i thought it would be and the back is a little bulky but its great. Keeps everything perfect and cold and the sound isnt loud at all on mine?? its like barely a hum but also its in my bathroom so its not like i hear it often so maybe if you kept it in your room it could be annoying but white noise/humming doesnt bother me (its super quiet imo). If you need a sign to buy this here it is!! Buy this!! (it makes me so excited to wash my face)!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Nice LITTLE fridge
customer_reviews.text: If you want to have some cold drinks at your desk, it works great. It can fit 6 short cans or 4 tall 12oz cans if you take the shelf out. My one complaint is that it's surprisingly light, so when you try to open the door it just slides on the desk and doesn't open. Some better grips on the bottom or something would be nice. I haven't tried it yet, but I like that it comes with a car plug so you can travel with baby bottles, medicine, etc. It also has a warming feature, but I don't care for hot soda so I haven't tested it out. Overall, a nice addition to the office!
customer_reviews.author: The Fonz

customer_reviews.title: Should be a 5 star but they got 3 because of the emails review request
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this a 3 star only because of the annoying emails to give a review. If not it would be a 5 star!! I bought this in Nov 2019 and just used it yesterday. Love that it has the hot and cold switch and that it makes my products cold. I’m an Esthetician and needed something compact but good for my studio. This did the job! If you want it to keep the beverages cold, it will keep them cool if you place too many inside, but cold enough for a cool refreshing drink. Suggestion to the vendor!! PLEASE STOP WITH ALL THE EMAILS REQUESTING A REVIEW.
customer_reviews.author: Salsera

customer_reviews.title: Not that cold but works for me
customer_reviews.text: I use it for baby formula storage because the kitchen fridge is too far away. Vertically, it fits two 4oz bottles stacked or one 4oz (ameda) and one 5oz (Medela) but only if you use the flat, low profile lids (Medela). I can cram 10 bottles (45oz) in this way, after taking off the door shelf thing. Be warned, it's not as cold as a proper fridge. If you have a preemie or a newborn you might want to put some frozen bottles in there and keep an eye on the temp. I've been using it 24/7 from abt one month. Still going strong 4 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Slardybardfast

customer_reviews.title: Decent mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty cold when plugged into the wall/car charger. Wish it got a little colder but it is better than one I had previously. The USB battery pack mode is mediocre and only good if you have access to ice for your drinks but it is better than dropping ice into a room temp drink or worse a drink in the back seat/trunk of a hot car. This will fit canned drinks well but 20oz sodas and sports drinks are just barely too tall to fit. Would recommend but wish it was a little taller to fit soda bottles at least.
customer_reviews.author: daringblaze

customer_reviews.title: Makeup fridge
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fridge! Plus it comes with various power source options - regular plus, usb plug, and one you can even use in a car. There’s a small handle on the top that makes carrying easy. I’m currently using it just for makeup and beauty products, as well as medication. It’s perfect for keeping those items out of the fridge, and small enough to fit on my vanity. I only wish the shelf was adjustable but I simply removed it for taller items. So far it’s kept everything cold, and it’s very quiet (I don’t hear it at all). Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Working great.
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to keep worms in, for our bearded dragon. We tried it on cool & warm when we first got it, both worked just fine. It's keeping the worms in their dormant stage so they don't transform before my pet can eat them all. Had it about a week, no issues so far. It's super quiet. I haven't noticed it running & it's out in the open near our pet cage (for now until I find a better place for it near an outlet), plugged in & on since we got it. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini-fridge! I use it to store milk for my coffee. I have a small coffee bar upstairs since I cannot manage the stairs after some surgeries. I have been using it for several months with no complaints. It does make a bit of noise which might be a factor if using it in a small area. There is a small amount of ice buildup on the back wall of the fridge after several weeks of use. I simply turn it off for a few hours and wipe up the moisture with a tissue. No problem. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Latte Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge, Poor packing
customer_reviews.text: Really nice small, compact fridge. It’s nice and cozy under my dorm bed with my guac, sour cream, and cheese. Only issue is probably regarding amazon and not the seller. WHY WAS THE BOX SO DAMN BIG. I actually got stuck in my school’s turnstile because the box was so huge I couldn’t push it properly. I had to use the box to push and when I finally made it through, it flipped out of my arms and bounced onto the floor. 10/10 for durability from the fridge, it took a hard landing. Also, no bubble wrap or air bubbles. Just nothing. 0/10 for amazon packing.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fridge for my skincare products. When it arrived, I was very surprised how small it actually was. I guess my expectations were inaccurate. Having said that, the fridge keeps my products cold and I haven't had any issues during the few days I've been using this. My only suggestion would be to know the actual size you want. It's my fault for not doing measurements first. I'm still keeping the fridge, I just put a few less products inside. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Annette S.

customer_reviews.title: No more stolen lunches!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this fridge. Not only is it one of the cutest things I’ve ever seen in my life, but it is actually perfectly functional, with ample space for a personal lunch + drink(s). I have it on a table right behind me in my office, and I have never even noticed any sound from it as I work. Food and drinks stay ice cold! I highly recommend this to anyone who is tired of sharing space in your smelly communal work fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October 2018 before the birth of my daughter to store milk upstairs in my bedroom. For several months, I have LOVED IT and have really come to depend on this piece of equipment. Unfortunately, it is now May 2019 (7 months later) and the refrigerator is not working. Found out the hard way tonight when I went to retrieve some milk and found it room temperature even though the fridge is on and turned to cook mode. Contacted amazon who won’t help. Working thru the warranty process now, hopeful the company will do the right thing and replace with a working unit. Will update this review when more info is available.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kline

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works great
customer_reviews.text: If you plug into a 110v outlet, the unit is super cold and works great. Sometimes, you might get a little ice on the metal screw inside the unit where the cold air are generated. If you plug into a USB or car port, they unit is not that cold. It is cool, but not cold. Cool temperature for fruits, but not for making soda or beer cold. You need 110 to to get can beverage super cold for drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible! I purchased this as a gift for my wife’s birthday, brought it home, plugged it in and it went POOF! Up in a cloud of smoke. I reached out to the seller who Basically told me that I voided the warranty. Now I have a brand new mini fridge that I cannot use and a wife who THOUGHT she had a really nice birthday gift end up disappointed, YAY for me! Beware if you purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brittingham II

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fridge but read my review ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing my review after a year of having the fridge. In the beginning the fridge worked great keeping my make up products cool and fresh and now almost exactly to the year of having it it stop cooling. I’m currently waiting for costumer service to get back to me and I do hope they replace it since I’m past the time of returning it through amazon. Would I recommend this product absolutely I just need to know what to do now that it stopped cooling. I do hope this helps...
customer_reviews.author: LaMeka Y. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It is practical
customer_reviews.text: This product is convenient for storing breast milk -especially while traveling in the car-. I really appreciate that this miniature refrigerator comes with, both, a standard wall and car charger. I'm a little disappointed, because my product came with one or two small dents, as well as a few stains. It took me quite a bit of elbow grease and time to get these -what appeared to be ink- blemishes, out of the plastic. I have a sneaking suspicion that this item was sent to me already used. To me, the most important aspect of this product is the functionality. It will do exactly what I need it to do; so I am content.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: Cooluli Compact Cooler Mini Fridge Great for small settings
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this little fridge for my husbands office! Works great he does unplug it before he leaves. Does tend to build up ice easily. But works great for adding in a small lunch and to keep a beverage chilled! He hasn't said anything about the noise so I don't think it's to bothersome. He has NOT tried the warming yet. It also looks nice on his desk and does not take up very much room. Great purchase! He has been using it about 2 months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeBean11

customer_reviews.title: It was decent until it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fridge for my daughter’s nursery on December 27, 2016. It was never truly pushed hard (it kept bottles chilled from downstairs as I was getting her ready for bed). It did an excellent job keeping liquids cooled. There was only one con: water collected in the inside of the fridge, even with no items placed inside. Unfortunately, this mini refrigerator stopped working all together. I’m fairly disappointed, but I realize I’m outside of time for Amazon to do anything about it. I’d be concerned about buying this item again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stoshak

customer_reviews.title: A nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good use for temporary breastmilk storage in the middle of the night so I don’t have to walk downstairs to store my milk. But be aware this does not achieve the same coldness as the refrigerator and it’s best not to store breast milk inside for more than the night time. It’s more of a cooler. I love this cow design! Matches well with the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Cao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Cooler
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this little cooler. With Covid I did not want to put my lunch in germy fridge at work so I purchased this. I is just the right size for a fee cans of pop and my sandwich or salad. When I leave work I put in 2 bottles of water for next day. It is quiet and keeps everything at the perfect temperature. I have only been using for about 3 weeks now. I liked it so much I purchased one for my husbands office.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous , compact and keeps items cool !
customer_reviews.text: This was the most easy to unboxed and plug-in and start using. I purchase this mini refrigerator to store my cats insulin which needed to be kept refrigerated. It is compact and very quiet. It definitely keeps her medications at the right temperature preventing it from spoiling. I really love this product and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a very compact refrigerator to store medications or cosmetics or even refreshments.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER S. ITO

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cool & leaks water
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cooler. It's a box that leaks water, so if that's what you're looking for, look no further. I kept it plugged into a regular electric outlet and it doesn't cool anything but creates pools of water which spill out when you open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Randi k

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of overfilling
customer_reviews.text: if there's no room to circulate air it can take a day to refrigerate things, and can be prone to warm spots. Why this is relevant? There isn't a lot of room to begin with, so you should factor in the "open space" you need. Essentially, don't expect to supply a get together with your stocked mini fridge. If its for personal use though, it does its job well. Side note: who puts their fridge in the arm rest hole like in the advertisement LOL...
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good for beautiful presentation!
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is good for a display, beautiful. Water accumulated inside and dripped out (I stuffed the inside with paper towels to absorb the water, so not to ruin my furniture). The lowest temperature is not enough for cold drinks (just cooler than tap water). I loved the whispering motor in a quiet night, but not really enough to compensate for the inadequacy in giving me a cold drink in the middle of a summer night. This fridge will satisfy a four year old girl in her fantasyland. Sorry, please make it better to give the little princess a cooler drink.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done but Arrived Damaged and Cooling Keeps Changing
customer_reviews.text: This is a small but mighty little fridge that can pop into most spaces. Love that it has both a cooling and warming option and multiple ways to plug in (AC, DC and USB). The fridge door slot is also perfect for sheet masks. Only gripe is that it arrived damaged. It’s not impacting the functionality but bummed it’s cracked from the start. Update: the cooling function was so strong, it created ice inside. Then suddenly, it’s barely below room temp and there’s no way to adjust the temp (except from cool to hot). Ugh
customer_reviews.author: HPAlways

customer_reviews.title: Good little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but the fan is a little noisier than I expected. I bought an 'insulated lunch bag' that was just the right size to hold this mini fridge. When I travel, it works well to carry my refrigerated medications in the fridge, and plug it in when I arrive at my destination. It chills well. For the general public, it would be the right size for a six pack of canned soda or beer.
customer_reviews.author: RJMAN

customer_reviews.title: HOLDS MY INSULIN
customer_reviews.text: THIS LITTLE FRIDGE IS PERFECT TO HOLD MY INSULIN. I DO NOT HAVE TO WORRY IF A POWER OUTAGE OR ON A LONG TRIP. I CAN PLUG THIS INTO MY CAR OR REGULAR POWER. I PLAN ON USING AT WORK TO KEEP MY LUNCH COLD. WEIGHS ABOUT 1 LB EASY FOR ANYONE TO CARRY. I AM SO GLAD WE BOUGHT THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Army gal

customer_reviews.title: Looked used, door dented
customer_reviews.text: The package came quickly and the box was in good condition but after I opened it I saw several little dents all across the front of the door, and the door didnt have a snug seal when shut. I plugged it in one night and its very quiet, the products became cool but not very cold. I returned it and bought a different one since it came defective. I was so excited for this and very but became dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not last
customer_reviews.text: When working this is an efficient and aesthetically pleasing mini fridge! Unfortunately, the product does not last beyond a year of continued use. I want to love this product and company! Correspondence with customer service has not been successful in resolving the issue of the short longevity of the product. Therefore I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Mac

product_meta.title: Cooluli Mini Fridge Electric Cooler and Warmer (4 Liter / 6 Can): AC/DC Portable Thermoelectric System w/ Exclusive On the Go USB Power Bank Option (White)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Cooluli 4L Cooler & Warmer is perfect for home and office use as well as in the nursery, office or dorm room. It's capable of holding six (6) 12 ounce cans. Our thermoelectric cooling system is popularly used as a beverage cooler, but the warming function shouldn't be ignored. Save time in the morning by bringing your breakfast with you or save money by bringing your lunch and keeping it warm all day. Plus, we included both AC, DC and USB power cords to make the switch from standard (110V) to car (12V) to USB 2A power bank easy and convenient. No need to buy extra wires! We made it incredibly easy to switch from the cooling to the warming function as well. An easy-to-read display lights what setting the appliance is on and can be changed by simply flipping a switch. The Cooler & Warmer produces almost no noise (perfect for next to your bed to save a walk to the kitchen) and is compact and sleek enough to put on a desk at work. Cleaning the interior and exterior is extremely easy, simply wipe them down and the storage shelf inside is removable as well (for even easier cleaning as well as expanding to hold four 16 oz. bottles.) The Cooluli Cooler & Warmer also comes in five different colors: white, blue, pink, fuchsia and cow pattern. We're proud to offer unique, innovative products and wanted to give you the options to match your room and style.FLEXIBLE INPUT: AC 100-120V,DC 12V/7A,48w max
feature_bullets: SWITCH FROM HEATING TO COOLING: The thermoelectric system allows for easy switching from beverage cooler to food warmer! Holds up to six 12 oz. cans. Ideal size for use at home, in the nursery, office or dorm room – Mom’s love the ability to keep milk or formula at the right temperature. Bring your lunch to work in the morning and keep it hot all day. Change from cooling to heating with the flip of a switch!

AC/DC and USB ADAPTERS INCLUDED: The Cooluli Cooler & Warmer comes included with AC and DC power adapters – Easy to go from indoor 110V (AC) to car use by plugging the appliance into the car cigarette 12V (DC) adapter. Capable of being powered with a 2A power bank with included USB cord for even more portability! Not recommended for computer use as it may not generate enough power (Note when using USB power the Cooler/Warmer will only operate in ECO mode)

SLEEK, DURABLE DESIGN: The Cooler & Warmer has a beautiful matte finish on the outside. Sleek enough to leave at home or in the office – fits perfectly on your desk. Simply wipe it down to clean the inside and outside. The lightweight, sturdy polypropylene (PP) plastic design and magnetic self-lock latching door along with included DC adapter makes the Cooler/Warmer portable. The carrying handle on top makes transporting the appliance even more convenient.

THERMOELECTRIC COOLING SYSTEM: The thermoelectric cooler and food warmer works by transferring heat from one side of the device to the other along with electric energy. It’s recommended to wait 30 minutes before going from cold to hot. The Cooler & Warmer is 100% safe and Freon free. Since thermoelectric cooling works without refrigerants the Cooluli Cooler & Warmer is also environmentally friendly!
Exterior Dimensions: 11" x 7-1/4" x 10” / Cooling Capacity: 40ºF-45ºF below ambient temperature / Warming Capacity: 122ºF-144ºF

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars8,705 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
